00042     static bool comparePosStart(const _BASE_ &item, const int & value)
00043     {
00044         return item.getStart() < value;
00045     }
00046     static bool compareStart(const _BASE_ &item1, const _BASE_ &item2)
00047     {
00048         return item1.getStart() < item2.getStart();
00049     }
00050     static bool compareLenght(const _BASE_ &item1, const _BASE_ &item2)
00051     {
00052         return item1.getLenght() < item2.getLenght();
00053     }
00054     static bool comparePos(const _BASE_ &item1, const _BASE_ &item2)
00055     {
00056         if ((item1.getStart() != item2.getStart()))
00057             return item1.getStart() < item2.getStart();
00058         else
00059             return item1.getEnd() < item2.getEnd();
00060     }

00225     //TODO send back a chrom&
00226     template<class UnaryOperation>
00227     auto computeOnAllSites(UnaryOperation unary_op) -> std::vector<decltype(unary_op(_BASE_()))>
00228     {
00229         try{
00230             std::vector<decltype(unary_op(_BASE_()))> results;
00231             results.reserve(VecSites.size());
00232             transform(std::begin(VecSites), std::end(VecSites), std::back_inserter(results), unary_op);
00233             return results;
00234         }
00235         catch(std::exception &e)
00236         {
00237             throw e;
00238         }
00239     }

00252     //TODO return chrom,
00253     template<class UnaryPredicate>
00254     std::vector<_BASE_> getSpecificSites(UnaryPredicate pred) const
00255     {
00256         try
00257         {
00258             std::vector<_BASE_> copyVec {};
00259             copyVec.reserve(VecSites.size());
00260             copy_if(std::begin(VecSites), std::end(VecSites), std::back_inserter(copyVec), pred);
00261             return copyVec;
00262         }
00263         catch(std::exception & e)
00264         {
00265             #ifdef DEBUG
00266                std::cerr << "Throwing in getSpecificSites()" <<std::endl;
00267             #endif
00268             throw e;
00269         }
00270     }

00272         template<class UnaryPredicate>
00279     void removeSpecificSites(UnaryPredicate pred)
00280     {
00281         try
00282         {
00283             VecSites.erase(std::remove_if(VecSites.begin(), VecSites.end(), pred), VecSites.end());
00284         }
00285         catch(std::exception & e)
00286         {
00287             #ifdef DEBUG
00288                std::cerr << "Throwing in removeSpecificSites()" <<std::endl;
00289             #endif
00290             throw e;
00291         }
00292     }

00307     template<class UnaryOperation>
00308     UnaryOperation applyOnAllSites(UnaryOperation f)
00309     {
00310         try
00311         {   if (VecSites.size()>0)
00312                 return for_each(std::begin(VecSites), std::end(VecSites), f);
00313             else
00314                 return f;
00315         }
00316         catch(std::exception & e)
00317         {
00318             throw e;
00319         }
00320     }

00324     {
00325         try
00326         {
00327             return for_each(std::begin(VecSites), std::end(VecSites), f);

00347         template<class BinaryOperation, class InitialValue>
00348         InitialValue accumulateSitesInfo(BinaryOperation binary_op, InitialValue init) const
00349         {
00350             // Force using sequential version for accumulate as parallel version
00351             // doesn't work if actual data type of InitialValue and _BASE_ cannot be
00352             // converted back and forth.
00353             return __gnu_parallel::accumulate(std::begin(VecSites), std::end(VecSites), init, binary_op, __gnu_parallel::sequential_tag());
00354         }
00374         template<class Compare>
00375         void sortSites(Compare comp,std::function<float(const _BASE_*)> getStart_funct=nullptr,std::function<float(const _BASE_*)> getEnd_funct=nullptr)
00376         {
00377             try
00378             {
00379                 this->m_isSorted=true;
00380                 sortGetStart=getStart_funct;
00381                 sortGetEnd= getEnd_funct;
00382                 m_comptFunc=comp;
00383 
00384                 return std::sort(std::begin(VecSites), std::end(VecSites), comp);
00385             }
00386             catch(std::exception &e)
00387             {
00388                 throw e;
00389             }
00390         }
00391 
00396         void sortSites()
00397         {
00398             try
00399             {
00400                 return sortSites(compareStart,&_BASE_::getStart,&_BASE_::getEnd);
00401             }
00402             catch (std::exception & e )
00403             {
00404                 throw e;
00405             }
00406 
00407         }

00683     template <class _BASE_>
00684     _BASE_ uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::generateRandomSite(const int size, std::mt19937& engine, const int sigma, const std::string ID) const
00685     {
00686         try
00687         {
00688             uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> emptyExcl;
00689             return generateRandomSite(size,engine,emptyExcl,sigma,ID);
00690         }
00691         catch(std::exception &e)
00692         {
00693             throw e;
00694         }
00695     }
00696 
00697     template <class _BASE_>
00698     template <class T2>
00699     _BASE_ uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::generateRandomSite
00700     (const int size_,std::mt19937& engine,const uGenericNGSChrom<T2> &exclList, const int sigma, const std::string ID) const
00701     {
00702         //TODO Sanity check here to make sure it is possible to generate the asked for tag.
00703 
00704         try
00705         {
00706             _BASE_ returnTag;
00707 
00708             bool found=false;
00709             int size = size_;
00710 
00711             int max = this->getChromSize();
00712 
00713             while (!found)
00714             {
00715                 int max = this->getChromSize();
00716                 {
00717                     _BASE_ temptag;
00718                     if (sigma!=0)
00719                     {
00720                         std::normal_distribution<float> gaussian(size, sigma);
00721                         size = (int)gaussian(engine);
00722                     }
00723 
00724                     if (size>=1)
00725                     {
00726                         int shift = size/2;
00727                         //Generating our distribution at each call is probably needlesly heavy.. check to optimize this in time.
00728                         std::uniform_int_distribution<int> unif((shift+1), (max-shift));
00729                         int center = unif(engine);
00730                         temptag.setEnd(center+shift);
00731                         temptag.setStart(center-shift);
00732                         temptag.setChr(this->getChr());
00733                         //TODO Is this valid for our basic tags?
00734                         temptag.setName(ID);
00735 
00736                         if ((exclList.getSubset(temptag.getStart(),temptag.getEnd())).count()==0)
00737                         {
00738                             found=true;
00739                             returnTag=temptag;
00740                             returnTag.setChr(this->getChr());
00741                         }
00742                     }
00743                 }
00744             }
00745 
00746             return returnTag;
00747         }
00748         catch(std::exception & e)
00749         {
00750 
00751             throw e;
00752         }
00753     }
00754 
00755     template <class _BASE_>
00756     template <class T2>
00757     void uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::addNRandomSite
00758     (const int size, const int n, std::mt19937& engine, const uGenericNGSChrom<T2>& exclList, const int sigma, const std::string ID)
00759     {
00760         //Create each tag and add it.
00761         try
00762         {
00763             std::string tempID=ID+"-"+getChr()+"-";
00764             for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
00765             {
00766                 VecSites.push_back(generateRandomSite(size, engine,exclList,sigma, utility::concatStringInt(tempID, i)));
00767             }
00768             chr = VecSites.back().getChr();
00769         }
00770         catch(std::exception &e)
00771         {
00772             throw e;
00773         }
00774 
00775     }
00776 
00777     template <class _BASE_>
00778     void uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::addNRandomSite
00779     (const int size, const int n, std::mt19937& engine, const int sigma, const std::string ID)
00780     {
00781         try
00782         {
00783             uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> emptyExcl;
00784             addNRandomSite(size,n, engine,emptyExcl,sigma, ID);
00785         }
00786         catch(std::exception &e)
00787         {
00788             throw e;
00789         }
00790     }

00798     template <class _BASE_>
00799     unsigned long long uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::avgSiteSize() const
00800     {
00801         try
00802         {
00803             if (this->count() == 0)
00804                 return 0;
00805             return sumSiteSize()/this->count();
00806         }
00807         catch(std::exception & e)
00808         {
00809             throw e;
00810         }
00811     };
00812 
00813     template <class _BASE_>
00819     unsigned long long uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::sumSiteSize() const
00820     {
00821         try
00822         {
00823             return accumulateSitesInfo([](unsigned long long partialSum, _BASE_ item) -> unsigned long long
00824             {
00825                 return partialSum + item.getLenght();
00826             }, 0ULL);
00827         }
00828         catch(std::exception & e)
00829         {
00830             throw e;
00831         }
00832     }
00833 
00834 //return the smallest site size
00835     template <class _BASE_>
00836     unsigned long long uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::minSiteSize() const
00837     {
00838         try
00839         {
00840             if (this->count() == 0)
00841                 return ULONG_MAX;
00842 
00843             return minSite(compareLenght)->getLenght();
00844         }
00845         catch(std::exception & e)
00846         {
00847             throw e;
00848         }
00849     };
00850 
00851 //Largest site size
00852     template <class _BASE_>
00853     unsigned long long uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::maxSiteSize() const
00854     {
00855         if (this->count() == 0)
00856             return 0;
00857         return maxSite(compareLenght)->getLenght();
00858     };
00859 
00860 //Count how many start at same unique positions
00861     template <class _BASE_>
00862     long int uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::countUnique() const
00863     {
00864         long int count=0;
00865         int current;
00866         std::map<int, int >  myUniqueMap;
00867 
00868         typename std::vector<_BASE_>::iterator iterVec;
00869 
00870         for (iterVec = VecSites.begin() ; iterVec!= VecSites.end(); iterVec++)
00871         {
00872             current= iterVec.getStart();
00873             if (myUniqueMap.count(current)==0)
00874                 myUniqueMap.insert( std::pair<int,int>(current,current));
00875         }
00876         count=myUniqueMap.size();
00877 
00878         return count;
00879     };
00880 
00881 //Return a vector containing the size of every
00882     template <class _BASE_>
00883     std::vector<long long> uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::returnSiteSizes() const
00884     {
00885         return computeOnAllSites([] (_BASE_ elem) -> long long {return elem.getLenght();});
00886     }
00887 
00888 //Output functions
00889     template <class _BASE_>
00890     void uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::outputBedFormat(std::ostream& out)
00891     {
00892 
00893         // applyOnAllSites(bind(bind(&_BASE_::writeBedToOuput), out));
00894         applyOnAllSites(bind2nd(mem_fun_ref(&_BASE_::writeBedToOuput), out));
00895     }

00898 
00899     template <class _BASE_>
00900     void uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::printStats(std::ostream& out) const
00901     {
00902         typename std::vector<long long> quarts;
00903 
00905         quarts = utility::quartilesofVector(computeOnAllSites([] (_BASE_ elem) -> long long {return elem.getLenght();}));
00906 
00907         out <<"Number of sites"<< "\t"<< this->count()<<"\n";
00908         out <<"Average sites size:"<< "\t"<< this->avgSiteSize()<<"\n";
00909         out <<"Median size: "<< "\t"<< quarts.at(1)<<"\n";
00910         out <<"q1 :" << "\t"<< quarts.at(0)<<"\n";
00911         out <<"q3 :" << "\t"<< quarts.at(2)<<"\n";
00912         auto minAndMax = minAndMaxSites(compareLenght);
00913         out <<"Min sites size:"<< "\t"<< minAndMax.first->getLenght() <<"\n";
00914         out <<"Max sites size:"<< "\t"<< minAndMax.second->getLenght() <<"\n";
00915 
00916     }
00917 
00918 
00925     template <class _BASE_>
00926     typename std::vector<_BASE_>::const_iterator uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::findPrecedingSite(const float position) const
00927     {
00928         try
00929         {
00931             if (m_isSorted==false)
00932                 throw ugene_exception_base() <<string_error("findPrecedingSite called on unsorted vector \n") ;
00933             if ((sortGetStart==nullptr)||(sortGetEnd==nullptr))
00934                 throw ugene_exception_base() <<string_error(" findPrecedingSite called on chrom without appropriate start or end function\n") ;
00935             auto comp = [&] (const _BASE_ &item1, const float &item2)
00936             {
00937                 return sortGetStart(&item1)< item2;
00938             };
00939 
00941             auto lower = std::lower_bound(VecSites.begin(), VecSites.end(), position, comp);
00942 
00944             if (lower==VecSites.end()||(lower==VecSites.begin()))
00945                 return VecSites.end();
00946 
00948             lower--;
00949             return (lower);
00950         }
00951         catch (ugene_exception_base & e)
00952         {
00953 
00954 #ifdef DEBUG
00955             std::cerr << "Calling findPrecedingSite on unsorted vector or you did not provide an approriate get function" <<std::endl;
00956             std::cerr << "sorted status is" << m_isSorted <<std::endl;
00957             std::cerr << "is Nullprt "<< (sortGetStart==nullptr) <<std::endl;
00958 #endif
00959             throw e;
00960         }
00961     }
00962 //TODO test this and complimentary
00963     template <class _BASE_>
00964     typename std::vector<_BASE_>::const_iterator uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::findNextSite(const float position) const
00965     {
00966         try
00967         {
00969             if ((m_isSorted==false)||(sortGetStart==nullptr)||(sortGetEnd==nullptr))
00970                 throw ugene_exception_base();
00972             auto comp = [&] (const float &item1, const _BASE_ &item2)
00973             {
00974                 return item1< sortGetStart(&item2);
00975             };
00976 
00978             auto upper = std::upper_bound(VecSites.begin(), VecSites.end(), position, comp);
00979 
00981             if (upper==VecSites.end())
00982                 return VecSites.end();
00983 
00985             return (upper);
00986         }
00987         catch (std::exception & e)
00988         {
00989             std::cerr << "Calling findNextSite on unsorted vector or you did not provide an approriate get function" <<std::endl;
00990             throw;
00991         }
00992     }

01003     template <class _BASE_>
01004     int uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::getSubsetCount(float start, float end, OverlapType overlap) const
01005     {
01006         try
01007         {
01008             auto pos = this->findPrecedingSite(start);
01010             if (pos==this->end())
01011                 pos=this->begin();
01012             int tagcount=0;
01013             for (; pos != this->end(); pos++)
01014             {
01015                 if (sortGetStart(&(*pos))> end)
01016                     break;
01017                 if (utility::isOverlap(sortGetStart(&(*pos)), sortGetEnd(&(*pos)),start, end,overlap))
01018                     tagcount++;
01019             }
01020 
01021             return tagcount;
01022         }
01023         catch (ugene_exception_base & e )
01024         {
01025             throw e;
01026         }
01027         catch(std::exception & e)
01028         {
01029             //std::cerr << " Catching in getSubsetCount" <<std::endl;
01030             throw e;
01031         }
01032     }
01033 
01034 
01043     template <class _BASE_>
01044     uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::getSubset(float start, float end, OverlapType overlap) const
01045     {
01046         try
01047         {
01048             uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> returnChrom;
01049             returnChrom.setChr(this->getChr());
01050 
01051             auto pos = this->findPrecedingSite(start);
01052 
01054             if (pos==this->end())
01055                 pos=this->begin();
01056 
01057             typename std::vector<_BASE_>::const_iterator iterVec;
01058             iterVec=VecSites.begin();
01059 
01060             for (; pos != this->end(); pos++)
01061             {
01062                 if (sortGetStart(&(*pos))> end)
01063                     break;
01064                 _BASE_ temp;
01065                 if (utility::isOverlap(sortGetStart(&(*pos)), sortGetEnd(&(*pos)),start, end,overlap))
01066                     returnChrom.addSite(*pos);
01067             }
01068 
01069             return returnChrom;
01070         }
01071         catch(std::exception & e)
01072         {
01073 
01074             throw e;
01075         }
01076 
01077     }
01078 
01087     template <class _BASE_>
01088     uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::removeSubset(float start, float end, OverlapType overlap)
01089     {
01090         try
01091         {
01092             uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> returnChrom;
01093             returnChrom.setChr(this->getChr());
01094             std::vector<int> erasePositions;
01095 
01096             auto pos = this->findPrecedingSite(start);
01097 
01099             if (pos==this->end())
01100                 pos=this->begin();
01101 
01102             typename std::vector<_BASE_>::iterator iterVec;
01103             iterVec=VecSites.begin();
01104 
01105 
01106             auto delPos=pos;
01107             for (; pos != this->end(); pos++)
01108             {
01109                 if (sortGetStart(&(*pos))> end)
01110                     break;
01112                 if (utility::isOverlap(sortGetStart(&(*pos)), sortGetEnd(&(*pos)),start, end,overlap))
01113                 {
01114                     returnChrom.addSite(*pos);
01115                     pos--;
01116                     delPos=pos;
01117                     this->removeSite( to_mutable_iterator(VecSites,delPos ));
01118                 }
01119             }
01120 
01121             return returnChrom;
01122         }
01123         catch(std::exception & e)
01124         {
01125             throw e;
01126         }
01127 
01128     }
01130     template <class _BASE_>
01131     template <class T2>
01132     uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::getOverlapping(uGenericNGSChrom<T2> &compareChr,OverlapType overlap) const
01133     {
01134         try
01135         {
01136             uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> returnChr;
01137             for(auto it= VecSites.begin(); it!=VecSites.end(); it++)
01138             {
01139                 for(auto compit= compareChr.begin(); compit!=compareChr.end(); compit++)
01140                 {
01141                     if (utility::isOverlap(it->getStart(), it->getEnd(),compit->getStart(),compit->getEnd(),overlap))
01142                     {
01143                         returnChr.addSite(*it);
01144                         break;
01145                     }
01146                 }
01147             }
01148             return returnChr;
01149         }
01150         catch(std::exception & e)
01151         {
01152             throw e;
01153         }
01154 
01155     }
01156     //TODO should this be in here or in chrom?
01157     template<typename _BASE_>
01158     uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::getDistinct(std::string chr, int start, int end, OverlapType options)
01159     {
01160         uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> returnChrom;
01161 
01162         //If you want to use this, you will need to declare a constructur in the parent class of _CHROM_ to manage a _CHROM_<_BASE_> elementa
01163         //Copy constructor!
01164         returnChrom= this->getNotOverlapping(start, end);
01165         return returnChrom;
01166     }
01167 
01169     template <class _BASE_>
01170     template <class T2>
01171     uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::getNotOverlapping(uGenericNGSChrom<T2> &compareChr,OverlapType overlap)const
01172     {
01173         try
01174         {
01175             uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> returnChr;
01176             bool add=true;
01177             for(auto it= VecSites.begin(); it!=VecSites.end(); it++)
01178             {
01179                 for(auto compit= compareChr.begin(); compit!=compareChr.end(); compit++)
01180                 {
01181                     if (utility::isOverlap(it->getStart(), it->getEnd(),compit->getStart(),compit->getEnd()))
01182                     {
01183                         add=false;
01184                         break;
01185                     }
01186                 }
01187                 if (add)
01188                     returnChr.addSite(*it);
01189                 add =true;
01190             }
01191             return returnChr;
01192         }
01193         catch(std::exception & e)
01194         {
01195             throw e;
01196         }
01197     }

01206     template <class _BASE_>
01207     void uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::divideItemsIntoNBins(int N, SplitType type)
01208     {
01209         std::vector<_BASE_> newVector;
01210         std::vector<_BASE_> tempVector;
01211         try
01212         {
01213             for( _BASE_& x : VecSites)
01214             {
01215                 tempVector = move(x.divideIntoNBin(N,type));
01216                 newVector.insert( newVector.end(), tempVector.begin(), tempVector.end() );
01217             }
01218 
01219             VecSites=move(newVector);
01220         }
01221         catch(std::exception & e)
01222         {
01223 #ifdef DEBUG
01224             std::cerr << "Failed in dividerItemsIntoNBins"<<std::endl;
01225 #endif
01226             throw e;
01227         }
01228     }
01236 //TODO check this again
01237     template <class _BASE_>
01238     void uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>::divideItemsIntoBinofSize(int N, SplitType type)
01239     {
01240         std::vector<_BASE_> newVector;
01241         std::vector<uGenericNGS> tempVector;
01242         try
01243         {
01244             for( _BASE_& x : VecSites)
01245             {
01246                 tempVector =(move(x.divideIntoBinofSize(N,type)));
01247                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < tempVector.size(); ++i )
01248                 {
01249                     newVector.push_back(static_cast<_BASE_>( tempVector.at(i) ));
01250                 }
01251             }
01252             VecSites=move(newVector);
01253         }
01254         catch(std::exception &e)
01255         {
01256 #ifdef DEBUG
01257             std::cerr << "Failed in divideItemsIntoBinofSize"<<std::endl;
01258 #endif
01259             throw e;
01260         }
01261     }
01262     template <class _BASE_>
01263     void uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_>:: inferChrSize()
01264     {
01265         this->maxSite(comparePos)->getEnd();
01266     }
